name: La Condesa's Perrito de Sal
description: Perrito means little dog in Spanish. Inspired by the Salty Dog, Nate Wales of La Condesa took the basic gin and grapefruit drink and transformed it into a savory and lively concoction.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons finely grated zest from 1 grapefruit
2 ounces sotol blanco such as Hacienda de Chihuahua
2 ounces freshly squeezed juice from 1 grapefruit
1 ounce freshly squeezed lime juice from about 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the grapefruit zest with the salt and sugar. Place the grapefruit salt on a plate. Use a lime wedge to wet the rim of the rocks glass. Press the rim onto the grapefruit salt. Fill with ice.

Combine sotol, Green Chartreuse, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and simple syrup into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake for 15 seconds then strain cocktail into glass. Garnish with grapefruit slice and serve.
